attributes.action: Make it so you can go to the toilet whenever at school
attributes.additional_details: I want them to make it so you can go to the toilet whenever at school because teachers at many schools don't allow students to go during class especially on their period.
attributes.background: My background is when I asked even though I was really desperate they wouldn't let me go same with my classmates.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
